name: Bevolve
description:
Manage, grow, and evolve a colony of bees! Survive for 5 minutes to win. You lose when you run out of honey.

  • Send out up to 3 different groups of bees, with different stats. You can pay honey to add a bee to a selected group.
  • Select randomly generating flower beds in the world to see their information. Send your groups there to gather honey for you!
  • Beware! Some regions are hostile. So spend DNA to add traits like increased speed, predator prevention, and DNA generation to your bee groups! 
  • Wow! That's a lot of clicking!
